title: Did Calif. Announce It Will Pay Undocumented Residents COVID-19 Stimulus While Laying Off First Responders?
subtitle: A meme linked two separate events together to foment political controversy.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: On the same day California announced it would provide some undocumented residents COVID-19 stimulus payments, it also announced it would lay off first responders because of a lack of funds.
